# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and potential impact on your business, I am confident it could be worth $1200000 to you. After careful consideration, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $1100000. This is an exclusive offer designed to ensure you receive the best possible value while securing your position for future growth and success. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your business objectives. Kind regards, Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,100,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,100,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
